mapper.select: select * from (select a.*, rownum r from (select * from partner p join p_product pp on p.p_id = pp.p_id)a) where r between #{start} and #{end} order by rating desc
select r.*, m.id as id, pp.roomtitle as roomtitle, pp.p_id as p_id FROM planner p, member m, reservation r, p_product pp WHERE p.id=m.id AND p.planner_id=r.planner_id AND r.roomcode=pp.roomcode
